column1: Question
Explain the difference between stack and queue data structures. Give real-world examples.
What is time complexity? Explain Big O notation with examples.
How would you reverse a linked list? Explain the algorithm.
What is the difference between a process and a thread?
Explain object-oriented programming principles (OOP). What are the four main pillars?
What is polymorphism? Explain with an example.
How does a HashMap work internally in Java?
What is the difference between SQL and NoSQL databases?
Explain the concept of normalization in databases.
What are SOLID principles in software design?
Describe the different types of design patterns you know.
What is a singleton pattern and when would you use it?
Explain the concept of dependency injection.
What is REST API? What are the HTTP methods?
What is the difference between GET and POST requests?
How would you design a URL shortening service like bit.ly?
Explain microservices architecture and its benefits.
What is load balancing and why is it important?
What is caching? Name some caching strategies.
Explain the CAP theorem in distributed systems.
Tell me about a challenging project you worked on.
Describe a time when you had to learn a new technology quickly.
How do you handle conflicts in a team?
Tell me about a time you showed leadership.
Describe a situation where you failed and what you learned.
How do you prioritize tasks when you have multiple deadlines?
What motivates you in your work?
Where do you see yourself in 5 years?
How do you stay updated with new technologies?
Describe a time when you had to deal with a difficult stakeholder.
Explain your software development process.
How would you handle a production system outage?
What is your approach to code reviews?
How do you ensure code quality in your projects?
Describe your testing strategy for a new feature.
How would you optimize a slow database query?
What is your experience with version control systems?
Explain continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD).
How do you handle technical debt in projects?
What is your approach to documentation?
